tidbits.title: Pirate History
tidbits.description: The Grenadines were a haunt for pirates, and the famous Captain William Kidd is rumored to have left treasure on one of the islands, contributing to its allure.

tidbits.title: Black Sand Beaches
tidbits.description: Unique black sand beaches like those found on Young Island near Saint Vincent offer a different seaside experience, attracting travelers seeking something distinct.
